pluginstrument.author: GoodSim
pluginstrument.description:
This is a modification of Russ Barlow's EADT x737NG Flaps-Autobrakes Panel that converts it for use with the ZiboMod 737. It uses ZIBO datarefs and commands and will only work correctly with the ZIBO 737.
It has flaps/slats (leading edge) indicators and an autobrake setting knob with associated indicator lights including antiskid . The flap pointer moves slowly.
Tested with ZiboMod 737-800 v.3.40 and Air Manager 3.7 .
GoodSim 5/28/20
